scripts.start:en: concurrently -n mock-backend,assets,angular "docker run --rm -p 8080:80 --name phonebook-source-mock -e ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT=Development tsystemsmms/phonebook-build:source-peoplesoft" "docker run --rm -p 8081:80 --name phonebook-assets tsystemsmms/phonebook-build:assets" "ng serve --ssl --proxy-config proxy.conf.json --configuration en"
scripts.start:de: concurrently -n mock-backend,assets,angular "docker run --rm -p 8080:80 --name phonebook-source-mock -e ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT=Development tsystemsmms/phonebook-build:source-peoplesoft" "docker run --rm -p 8081:80 --name phonebook-assets tsystemsmms/phonebook-build:assets" "ng serve --ssl --proxy-config proxy.conf.json --configuration de"
scripts.start-compose: npm run compose-build && docker-compose run --rm --service-ports angular npm run start:en
scripts.start-compose:debug: npm run compose-build && docker-compose run --rm --service-ports angular npm run start:debug
scripts.test-docker: npm run docker-build && docker run --rm build_phonebook npm run test
scripts.test-compose: npm run compose-build && docker-compose run --rm --service-ports angular npm run test
scripts.e2e: webdriver-manager update --versions.chrome=80.0.3987.106 --gecko false --standalone false && ng e2e --webdriverUpdate false
scripts.e2e-docker: npm run docker-build && docker run --rm build_phonebook npm run e2e
scripts.build-docker:prod: docker build -t phonebook . && docker run --rm phonebook:latest
scripts.build-compose:dev: npm run compose-build && docker-compose run --rm --service-ports nginx
scripts.compose:debug: npm run compose-build && docker-compose run --rm --service-ports angular bash
